A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was a hot garbage fire with no consistent tone. Half the time it comes off like watching an animated cartoon for kid with Finn and new character Rose' s subplot seeming like a moral lesson for 7 year olds. Other times it wants to be a serious and violent drama but none of the new characters are established enough to make you care. Kylo is still evil just cause\, Rey is still good just because. Add in forced humor that actually seems to pause for a laugh like it's a sitcom and\, I don't know at this point I'm poised to say the prequels are on track to be a better series of movies.
